q: The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon. Kate's my new girl and we're planning on getting married soon, Kelsey says on the Late Show. David Letterman asks,`` Oh you're getting married soon?''`` Sometime in February,'' Kelsey responds.
